QuestData.Title: The Fall of the Warlord
QuestData.Description: You've managed to survive this long, stranger. All that remains to be done here is to fell the Warlord of the arena.$b$bThis will be your first true test here. Bult would provide a challenge to even a battle-hardened Frostwolf.$b$bPlace the heads you've collected on spikes in the Frostfire Arena. They are sure to enrage the warlord and lure him into battle.$b$bCome out of the arena victorious and it will show that Durotan's trust in you was not misplaced.
